name: Buy Buddy Elektronik Güvenlik Bilişim Reklam Telekomünikasyon Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.Ş.
description: Developer of smart retail tags designed to help retailers manage inventory, customer behavior and employee efficiency. The company's tags are equipped with multiple sensors and machine-learning Al to provide detailed inventory information in real-time, accurately anticipate stock moves, and log in and track stores remotely, enabling retailers to spend time on selling instead of managing inventory, shelves, and other daily store activities.
